content:
It seems like Canary doesn't recognize the Decedent's Age resource. Please see attached screenshot and file.
image.png
Janet-Page.json
btw i use GTRI canary and tag @Saul Kravitz @Pete Krautscheid

Hi @Eric Trinh (Genesis) , thanks for reporting this issue, I think it's the same issue that was reported in another thread earlier today. Here's what I wrote there: I believe we've addressed it via a pull request to the .NET libraries (which Canary uses): https://github.com/nightingaleproject/vrdr-dotnet/pull/165. Once the team has reviewed and merged this change and updated Canary to use the updated .NET library this will be included in the next release of Canary.
